basic.blooming: Foliage plants, viewing period year around
basic.color: Leaf color green , fruit color dark brown

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Like sunshine, slightly resistant to half shade, grows in sunny places
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil is dry, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove aged tissues, dead and pest branches timely
